text: Corey Feldman shared a photo of his scar to update fans after he claimed he was attacked earlier this week. “ THE WORLDS SMALLEST KNIFE WOUND ….. OR?!?! YES I WAS ATTACKED 2 DAYS AGO, YES THEY USED SOME SORT OF SHARP WEAPON, AND YES IT WENT INTO MY BODY! ” Feldman captioned pic of the tiny wound on his body on Thursday, March 29. “ THIS IS WHAT THE SCAR LOOKS LIKE NOW, OBVIOUSLY IF IT WAS A KNIFE I GOT VERY
